name: BUN with a GUN VS. The Horror Dimension
name_original: BUN with a GUN VS. The Horror Dimension
description:
This is my 2D shooter project with the following elements changed from the template:

  1. The Player and all enemies are re-skinned with original designs.
  2. All backgrounds, obstacles, and walls are re-skinned with original designs.
  3. All sound effects and music are new tracks created using Garageband.
  4. All menus and buttons are re-skinned with original designs.
  5. Added instructions and various additional text to menus.
  6. Created 3 playable levels with replay buttons in the game over menus.

Created by Nick Green with some sound effects by Allison Moser.
